CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 推；推动；推行；挤压；挤开；强行通过；逼迫；说服；促进；迫使；敦促；促使；施压；推销；贩卖毒品；力劝；力劝…接受；推送（数据）；鞭策；激励；发起进攻；奋力前行
推；搡；推动；努力；奋斗；冲刺；挺进；进取心；积极性；坚定的努力；进攻；攻势；宣传活动；促销活动；动力；激励；倡导；鼓励

synonym.mean: 推；推进；增加；伸展；努力争取
推；决心；奋力；攻击；干劲；进取心

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有进取心的；爱出风头的；有冲劲的；固执己见的
奋斗的；莽撞的；有精力的；富有进取心的
推挤；推人犯规（篮球术语）
富有进取心的；有精力的
推进器；推进式飞机；推销员；非法销售者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常指迅猛地一推或突然有力地推进，侧重速度。
侧重指靠外力把人或物稳定、持续地向前推进。
一般指猛或费力地推开或移动人或物。
普通用词，指用突然的力量把人或物推向前进、推开或推到另一位置上。
中性词，既可指对好事的促进、推进，又可指对坏事的助长。
指在某一进程的任何时期或阶段提供积极的帮助与支持。
指能促进事物向前发展的因素，但这种因素并非决定性的。
口语用词，通常指利用自己的活动或影响推进某事。
通常指为加速某一进程或达到某个预期目的而给予有效的促进，强调作出有意识、决定性的努力。

word_group.brief_definition: 继续进行, 大力推进
把船撑离堤岸；离开；离去
把…向后推；把…推回原处；推迟
超越界线, 突破；接近极致
在必须采取行动(或做出决定)时, 在紧要关头, 在迫不得已时
不得已时；为难地, 勉强地
挥霍享乐, 铺张庆贺

bilingual.source: The tail beats the sea to push it along.
bilingual.target: 尾巴拍打海水推动它前进。

bilingual.source: They made paddles to push the boat along.
bilingual.target: 他们制作了桨来推动船只前进。

bilingual.source: Local people tried to push the whales back into the sea.
bilingual.target: 当地人试图把鲸鱼推回海里。

bilingual.source: Sometimes trains in Japan are so crowded that railway staff are employed to push passengers inside.
bilingual.target: 有时日本的火车非常拥挤，以至于需要铁路工作人员将乘客推入车厢。

bilingual.source: Can you help me push this cart?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我推一下这个大车吗？

bilingual.source: The vase will fall if you push it.
bilingual.target: 如果你推它，花瓶会掉落。

bilingual.source: Please don't push others with your elbow.
bilingual.target: 请不要用胳膊肘推别人。

bilingual.source: We need to push this big rock together.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一起推这块大石头。

list.abstract: 普提查·克瑟辛（พุฒิชัย เกษตรสิน），昵称Push，1986年7月3日出生于泰国叻丕府，毕业于宣都实皇家大学，泰国男演员、主持人。 2008年，以泰国GMM Channel频道《O:IC》节目主持人、ChillFM89电台DJ身份而正式进入演艺圈。2012年，主演的电视剧《世界的交汇点》播出。2014年，因主演的电视剧《魔幻天使》而人气上升。2015年，主演的《爱本没错》《丑小鸭》《我要成为超级巨星》等电视剧相继播出；同年，获得Siam Dara Star Awards魅力男星奖。2016年起，主演的《王子学院之帅气牛仔》《游戏幻影》《花戒指》《生日快乐》《你是我的心跳》《杉杉来吃》等电视剧相继播出。2023年，主演的电视剧《轻触我心》播出。
push，英语单词，及物动词、不及物动词、名词，作及物动词时意为“推动，增加；对…施加压力，逼迫；按；说服”，作不及物动词时意为“推进；增加；努力争取”，作名词时意为“推，决心；大规模攻势；矢志的追求”。

yingyinNormal.en: Push, push, glide. This is easy, I can do it on my own now, Mummy. Push, push, glide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 推推，滑，推推，滑。真的非常简单，我现在自己就可以做了，妈妈，推推，滑，推推，滑。

yingyinNormal.en: If only there was some one big and strong to push George along. I'm big and strong. I can push George. What a good idea, Peppa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是有一个强壮的人能去推一推乔治他就能动起来了。我就非常的强壮。我可以去推乔治。这主意身不错，佩奇！

yingyinNormal.en: I'll look after George while you teach Peppa how to skate. Skating is easy, Peppa. Just push with your feet and glide. Push, push, glide. See?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来看着乔治，你去教佩奇怎么滑冰吧。滑冰其实很简单，佩奇，就是用脚往前推，然后滑，推，滑，明白吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Higher, Mummy! George wants to play on the swing. Now, it's your turn, George. Hold tight! I want to push George. Push George gently, Peppa. Yes, Mummy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 高点，妈妈！乔治也想玩秋千。现在轮到乔治玩啦。你抓紧啦。我想来推乔治。你要清点推，佩琪。好的，妈妈。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Phoebe just get on the bike and, hey, I'll hold you up and push you. Okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，菲比，快坐上脚踏车，我会扶着你，帮你推，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Remember, Daddy Pig, push the lever forward to go forward. Aye aye, Grandpa Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 记好了。把遥控杆向前推的话，船就会向前行驶。我明白了，猪爷爷。

yingyinNormal.en: But I have to go home soon. Oh, I see! That's different. Let me push you then.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是，我马上就要回家了。噢，这样啊！那就不一样了。那么我来推你吧。

yingyinNormal.en: And since we don't have a TV, the lady across the alley said she'd push hers up to a window, so I could watch it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们没有电视，对面的小姐说她会把她的电视推到窗口让我看。

yingyinNormal.en: That was my idea. It's very good. You have a go. Can you push me? No, I'll huff and puff instead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是我提议坐秋千的。这提议真不错。应该你来坐。你可以推我吗？不，我只要用吹的就可以了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, dear, Grandpa's boat is stuck in the reeds. I'll just give it a little push. Do be careful, Daddy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，糟糕。猪爷爷的船陷在了芦苇丛中。那我下去推一下好了。一定要小心啊，猪爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa is playing on the swing. Mummy, Mummy! Push me! Please! Are you ready? Yes, I want to go really high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪在秋千上玩。妈妈，妈妈！推我一下好不好。你准备好了吗？是的，我想荡得很高。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy. Where have you been? I whizzed all the way down the hill, and then I had to push the bike all the way back up again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸.你去了哪里？我从山上一路滚下去了，然后我不得不把自行车一路推回来。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy. Where have you been? I whizzed all the way down the hill, and then I had to push the bike all the way back up again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸.你去了哪里？我从山上一路滚下去了，然后我不得不把自行车一路推回来。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you know what, bro? You're not star. That is a star. Get you hands off me. Get you hands off me. You don't push my body.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗，你才不是什么明星，那才叫明星。把你手拿开。把你手拿开。不许推我。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, a swing. That was my idea. It's very good. You have a go. Can you push me? No, I'll huff and puff instead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，是秋千。是我提议坐秋千的。这提议真不错。应该你来坐。你可以推我吗？不，我只要用吹的就可以了。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is stuck! It's not funny! It looks very funny, Daddy. I suppose it is a bit funny. We'll have to push you down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸卡住了！有什么好笑的！这看起来非常得好笑，爸爸。我想也许真的很好笑。我们得把你推下去。

yingyinNormal.en: To start, push up slowly with your sticks. To stop, point your skis together. Skiing is fun. Let's go back up and do it again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从慢慢向前推滑雪杆开始。要停下来的话，把滑雪板指向内。滑雪很有趣。我们回去再来一遍。

yingyinNormal.en: But you have been on the swing for ages. Grandpa Pig, could you push me a little bit please? I think it is someone else's turn now, Pedro.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你已经在秋千上玩很久了。请问猪爷爷，你可以过来推我一下吗？我觉得现在应该轮到别人来玩了，佩德罗。

yingyinNormal.en: You're kidding. No, sir, no, I took my dad's desk chair, attached a Speak & Spell to it and made my sister push me up and down the block to trick or treat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开玩笑的吧。绝对没有，我拿了我爸的写字椅装上一个拼说语音学习机，然后让我妹妹推我去街上讨糖吃。

yingyinNormal.en: About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有一件事你不能做就是忽视他们，因为他们改变了一些东西，他们把人类推向前进

exam_freq_info.chinese: 鼓励; 督促; 迫使

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 推；往前挤；促进…的使用；使（栈）准备接收顶层数据；对…作增感处理；（push的现在分词）
adj. 独断专行的；强人所难的；野心勃勃的

word_family.mean: v. 推；搡；往前挤；促进…的使用；使（栈）准备接收顶层数据；对…作增感处理；促使；迫使；敦促；推着

sense_info_list.en: affect something so that it reaches a particular level or state

examination_example.sentence: Somebody <highlight>pushes</highlight> corporate quotas as a way to promote gender equity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人把公司配额作为促进性别平等的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: Rather than pulling students back, a gap year <highlight>pushes</highlight> them ahead by preparing them for independence, new responsibilities and environmental changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 间隔年不是让学生退缩，而是促使他们为独立、新的责任和环境变化做好准备。

examination_example.sentence: The federal government is giving responsibility for managing the bird to the same industries that are <highlight>pushing</highlight> it to extinction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联邦政府将管理这种鸟类的责任交给了那些将其推向灭绝的行业。

sense_info_list.zh: 鼓励; 督促; 迫使

examination_example.sentence: You're only human, and sometimes your kids can <highlight>push</highlight> you just a little too far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你只是个普通人，有时候你的孩子会把你逼得有点过分。

examination_example.sentence: They had <highlight>pushed</highlight> the agency to designate the bird as "endangered".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们敦促该机构将这种鸟列为“濒危物种”。

sense_info_list.en: a determined effort to achieve something

examination_example.sentence: We need progressive policies that shape collective action (and rein in polluting businesses), alongside engaged citizens <highlight>pushing</highlight> for change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要可形成集体行动（并控制污染企业）的进步政策，以及力求变革的积极公民。

examination_example.sentence: Colleges and universities have <highlight>pushed</highlight> for decades to recruit more of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几十年来，学院和大学一直在努力招收更多的学生。

sense_info_list.en: force forward, downward, or outward
to go in front of other people who are waiting
move forward quickly through an area
advertise something repeatedly in order to increase its sales
sell illegal drugs
press a switch, button, etc., for example in order to make a machine start working

word_usage.usage: push作名词时，意为”推的动作“或”鼓励“，前面一般要加定冠词a或the；
push作动词时，是及物动词，后面接名词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 鼓励; 督促; 说服

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: force forward, downward, or outward

examination_example.sentence: In the second phase, as they grow wealthier, they pave the roads, allowing traffic to move faster and <highlight>pushing</highlight> up the death rate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到第二个阶段，随着他们变得富裕，他们铺路使交通速度更快，从而推高了死亡率。

examination_example.sentence: The ongoing <highlight>push</highlight> by the mining corporations to be more productive and more efficient is another powerful driver in embracing automation technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 矿业公司正在努力提高生产率和效率，这是采用自动化技术的另一个强大推动力。

examination_example.sentence: Last week, one operated by the taxi company Uber struck and killed a woman <highlight>pushing</highlight> her bicycle across a wide road in Arizona.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，Uber出租车公司运营的一辆出租车在亚利桑那州撞死了一名推着自行车穿过宽阔马路的妇女。

sense_info_list.en: affect something so that it reaches a particular level or state

examination_example.sentence: At first, the web seemed to <highlight>push</highlight> against this trend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，万维网似乎与这一趋势背道而驰。

examination_example.sentence: A range of factors has <highlight>pushed</highlight> Western Australia's desert to the lead of this automation revolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一系列因素促使西澳大利亚的沙漠成为这场自动化革命的领头羊。

sense_info_list.en: advertise something repeatedly in order to increase its sales
forcefully persuade or direct someone to do or achieve something
persuade or encourage somebody to do something that they may not want to do
sense_info_list.zh: 鼓励; 督促; 说服

exam_freq_info.chinese: 鼓励; 督促; 说服
一再要求; 反复争取

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 独断专行的；强人所难的；野心勃勃的

word_family.mean: v. 推；搡；往前挤；促进…的使用；使（栈）准备接收顶层数据；对…作增感处理；促使；迫使；敦促；推着

sense_info_list.en: affect something so that it reaches a particular level or state

examination_example.sentence: It is the force that <highlight>pushes</highlight> human society forward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是推动人类社会前进的力量。

examination_example.sentence: The minister is also <highlight>pushing</highlight> to stop public transportation from being cut in ways that leave people isolated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位部长还在努力阻止公共交通中断，以免人们被孤立。

examination_example.sentence: Now forests cover 11% of the land, and the government wants to <highlight>push</highlight> the proportion to 18% by the 2040s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在森林覆盖了11%的土地，政府希望这一比例到21世纪40年代可以提高至18%。

sense_info_list.en: force forward; downward; or outward

examination_example.sentence: They use the lack of gravity to their advantage as they <highlight>push</highlight> themselves around the cage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们利用失重的优势在笼子里互相推搡。

sense_info_list.en: advertise something repeatedly in order to increase its sales

examination_example.sentence: These companies, which long reaped big profits as textbook publishers, have boasted that their new online offerings, when <highlight>pushed</highlight> to students through universities they partner with, represent the future of the industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些长期以来一直作为教科书出版商，并获得丰厚利润的公司吹嘘说，当他们通过与他们合作的大学将其推向学生时，他们的新在线产品代表了该行业的未来。

sense_info_list.en: forcefully persuade or direct someone to do or achieve something
persuade or encourage somebody to do something that they may not want to do
sense_info_list.zh: 鼓励; 督促; 说服

sense_info_list.en: exert oneself continuously; vigorously; or obtrusively to gain an end
sense_info_list.zh: 一再要求; 反复争取

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Society <highlight>pushes</highlight> us to specialize, to become experts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会促使我们专业化，成为专家。

examination_example.sentence: What had <highlight>pushed</highlight> him to make such a tough decision took me by surprise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么促使他做出这样一个艰难的决定让我感到吃惊。

examination_example.sentence: She sees my talent and <highlight>pushes</highlight> me to do the best I possibly can.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她看到了我的才能，并推动我尽我所能做到最好。

examination_example.sentence: He stood on his back legs and <highlight>pushed</highlight> at the wooden fence posts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他用后腿站立着，用力推着木栅栏的柱子。

examination_example.sentence: By 9: 33am, a burst of additional traffic might <highlight>push</highlight> it to 145 seconds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到上午9点33分，额外的交通流量可能会将这一时间推至145秒。

examination_example.sentence: Less traffic at 9: 37am could <highlight>push</highlight> it down to 135.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早上9点37分的车流量减少，可能会使气温降至135度。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>push</highlight> of the local organizations
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地组织的推动

exam_freq_info.chinese: 鼓励; 说服; 督促; 逼迫

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 推；往前挤；促进…的使用；使（栈）准备接收顶层数据；对…作增感处理；（push的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 推；搡；往前挤；促进…的使用；使（栈）准备接收顶层数据；对…作增感处理；促使；迫使；敦促；推着

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 把船撑离堤岸；离开；离去

sense_info_list.en: force forward, downward, or outward

examination_example.sentence: This time, he <highlight>pushed</highlight> harder, but he still couldn't move the box a bit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一次，他用力推了推，但他仍然无法移动盒子。

examination_example.sentence: In fact he <highlight>pushed</highlight> the new student to the class because the student was in a wheelchair（轮椅）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，他把新学生推到课堂上是因为学生坐在轮椅上。

examination_example.sentence: If you've ever tried to <highlight>push</highlight> four big suitcases by yourself, you may understand my situation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你曾经尝试过自己推四个大行李箱，你可能会理解我的情况。

sense_info_list.en: persuade or encourage somebody to do something that they may not want to do
sense_info_list.zh: 鼓励; 说服; 督促; 逼迫

examination_example.sentence: My mom has always <highlight>pushed</highlight> me towards becoming independent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我妈妈总是鼓励我走向独立。

examination_example.sentence: She said tiger mothers believed that a child could succeed by being <highlight>pushed</highlight> to go all out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说，虎妈认为，孩子被逼着全力以赴，就能成功。

examination_example.sentence: People shouldn't <highlight>push</highlight> their kids so hard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们不应该这么逼迫自己的孩子。

sense_info_list.en: affect something so that it reaches a particular level or state

examination_example.sentence: Education <highlight>pushes</highlight> the human species to progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教育推动人类进步。

examination_example.sentence: His determination <highlight>pushed</highlight> him to adjust the newspapers according to the readers' taste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的决心促使他根据读者的品味调整报纸。

examination_example.sentence: So they have <highlight>pushed</highlight> down the number of polar bears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，他们促使了北极熊和海豹的数量减少。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Push</highlight> towards the seat
examination_example.sentence_trans: 挤向座位

examination_example.sentence: It is not good to <highlight>push</highlight> yourself into the crowd who's trying to get out anyway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将自己推入无论如何都想出去的人群中是不好的。

examination_example.sentence: As they <highlight>pushed</highlight> forward, however, the ship experienced small waves, and then bigger ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，当他们向前推进时，这艘船经历了小浪，然后是大浪。

examination_example.sentence: It is impolite (不礼貌的) to <highlight>push</highlight> in before others while waiting for the bus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 等车时插队在别人前面是不礼貌的。

examination_example.sentence: It is rude to <highlight>push</highlight> in before others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在别人之前插队是不礼貌的。

sense_info_list.en: advertise something repeatedly in order to increase its sales

examination_example.sentence: Governments around the world are <highlight>pushing</highlight> for an end to plastic straws and bags.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界各国政府都在推动塑料吸管和塑料袋的终结。

examination_example.sentence: Perfect, go to study music, to become a DJ, but please don't <highlight>push</highlight> your music taste onto other people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去学习音乐，成为DJ是完美的，但请不要把你的音乐品味强加给其他人。

examination_example.sentence: She took the bike off the track and into the main park to practice <highlight>pushing</highlight> off and picking up speed．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她将自行车带离赛道，进入主公园练习起步和提速。
